overview: Two tropical islands on either side of the Atlantic ocean. One deserted, the other organic. Two trips, twenty years apart. From each one I came back with images. Agua de vinagre is a travel film suspended between these two moments in time. An exploration of my presence through the images, the impossible expectation for an absent person to appear, there in front of the shutter of my camera. A cine-mourning.
title: Agua de vinagre
